features.name: num_speakers
features.description: Number of distinct speakers in the audio.

features.name: roles_detected
features.description: Semantic roles of speakers if they can be inferred.

features.name: customer_gender
features.description: Perceived gender of the main customer voice.

features.name: customer_speaking_rate
features.description: Overall speaking speed of the customer.

features.name: customer_main_emotion
features.description: Dominant emotion of the customer's voice.

features.name: customer_emotion_intensity
features.description: Strength of the customer's dominant emotion.

features.name: customer_sentiment
features.description: Overall sentiment from the customer's perspective.

features.name: interruptions_by_agent
features.description: Estimated number of times the agent talks over or cuts off the customer.

features.name: background_noise
features.description: Level of non-speech background noise during the call.

features.name: agent_politeness
features.description: Perceived politeness of the agent's tone and phrasing.

features.name: agent_confidence
features.description: Perceived confidence level of the agent's voice.

features.name: escalation_risk
features.description: Likelihood that the call will escalate based on tone and interaction.

features.name: call_outcome_signal
features.description: Whether the interaction sounds resolved from a voice and dialogue perspective.
